data.name: ANIMARAMA
data.detailed_description: ANIMARAMA is a short game in which the player has to solve problems by putting together a puzzle made up of four tiles. Tiles can be rotated, zoomed in and out within a tile. move the image left, right, up or down. Help the characters of the parables solve their problems.
data.about_the_game: ANIMARAMA is a short game in which the player has to solve problems by putting together a puzzle made up of four tiles. Tiles can be rotated, zoomed in and out within a tile. move the image left, right, up or down. Help the characters of the parables solve their problems.
data.short_description: ANIMARAMA - is a humorous interactive puzzle game in which you have to help the characters in the game solve their problems. To complete all the levels you will need the following skills: logic, physics, mathematics, humor and a little imagination. Will you be able to?
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Ge Force GTS 250
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Ge Force GTS 250
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
